title: 214 - Church, Leadership, and a Theology of Mental Illness
description:
Mike, Bonnie and Tim discuss and rebuke a social media post stating that people with mental illness should not be in pastoring roles, digging into the dangers of isolation and stigmatizing. Mike shares a "Theology of Mental Illness" that he prepared.
